channel.title: Need help with mods on Linux
channel.description:
Hi everybody,
I was wondering if anybody could point me toe the right direction.
I'm playing Satisfactory (Steam version) om Linux Mint 20. I've installed SMM and some mods, but the mods don't show up in Satisfactory, I was under the impression that I should see them in the mail menu
I'm probably doing something wrong but I have no idea what :roll_eyes: Any help is greatly appreciated.
Kind regards, Cor.

item.title: Need help with mods on Linux
item.dc:creator: @Cor_van_den_Berghe Cor Van Den Berghe

Hi everybody,
